# Project Navigation Menu

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/project-navigation-menu-in-fortnite
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T00:14:06.946235

---

Once you select a project from the Projects page in Creator Portal, you can use the project navigation menu to access publishing information, analytics for the project, any in-game items available in this project, and any Verse runtime errors generated.

Start by selecting a project from the **Projects** page.

[![Open the Projects page in Creator Portal to select a project.](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/97d1b900-c51b-4467-a470-524f4189d9b8?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/97d1b900-c51b-4467-a470-524f4189d9b8?resizing_type=fit)

Select a project on the Projects page.

Selecting a project opens the project's **Publishing** page. You will see the project navigation menu displayed in the left sidebar.

The following team roles can change the listing status from the project navigation menu:

- Owner
- Administrator
- Publisher

Team members who have the Collaborator project role won’t be able to change a project's listing status.

### Navigation Menu

[![The Project Navigation menu displayed for the selected project.](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/66d5d1d6-b0af-4c7b-99e5-061db37490ea?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/66d5d1d6-b0af-4c7b-99e5-061db37490ea?resizing_type=fit)

The Project Navigation menu displayed for the selected project.

| Menu Item | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Publishing** | Displays the project's publishing information. For more information on using this page, see [Publishing from the Creator Portal](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/publishing-from-the-creator-portal-in-fortnite-creative). |
| **Analytics** | Displays the Project Analytics page for this project. For more information on using this page, see [Project Analytics](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/project-analytics-for-fortnite-games). |
| **Technical** | Shows information on Verse runtime errors. For more information on using this page, see [Verse Runtime Error Reporting](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-runtime-error-reporting-in-fortnite-creative). |
| **Links** | Displays the Links page for this project. For more information on using this page, see [Links](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/links-in-fortnite-creative). |
